data.comment: The big names in today's match at Etihad Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 1, Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Peter Bankes awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
In Manchester West Bromwich's Karlan Ahearne-Grant is caught offside.
In the minute 6, Man City have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Man City.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Manchester West Bromwich drive forward through Karlan Ahearne-Grant. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Phil Foden for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at Etihad Stadium.
Free kick for Man City in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 14, Peter Bankes blows against Man City's Gabriel Jesus for offside.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 16, Man City have a dangerous throw-in.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Man City's Phil Foden is whistled for offside at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 20, Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Manchester.
Benjamin Mendy of Man City gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for West Bromwich at Etihad Stadium.
Karlan Ahearne-Grant for West Bromwich is whistled offside.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 25, Man City attack but Rodri's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Man City to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
In the minute 27, In Manchester, Phil Foden of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at Etihad Stadium.
Ilkay Gundogan is on target to give Man City a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 30, Raheem Sterling instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Manchester West Bromwich attack through Conor Gallagher. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 32, Peter Bankes awards Man City a goal kick.
Joao Cancelo of Man City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 38, Man City's Joao Cancelo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Free kick Man City.
In the minute 40, Conor Gallagher (West Bromwich) has received a first yellow card.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
In the minute 42, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! West Bromwich go level at 1-1 through Ruben Dias in Manchester.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
Grady Diangana has recovered and rejoins the match in Manchester.
In the minute 45, Peter Bankes signals a throw-in for Man City, close to West Bromwich's area.
The first-half is over at Etihad Stadium.
Grady Diangana is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Kevin De Bruyne (Man City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 47, Peter Bankes signals a Man City throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Throw-in for West Bromwich close to the penalty box.
In the minute 48, Man City needs to be cautious. West Bromwich have an attacking throw-in.
West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Joao Cancelo (Man City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Man City.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Rodri for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Man City's Kevin De Bruyne misses with an attempt on goal.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Man City have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Man City's Ilkay Gundogan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
Man City surge into the attack at Etihad Stadium but Gabriel Jesus’s header is off-target.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City push forward at Etihad Stadium and Gabriel Jesus gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Bromwich defence.
In the minute 57, Man City drive upfield and Raheem Sterling gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gabriel Jesus for Man City who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 59, Man City’s Gabriel Jesus is on his feet again at Etihad Stadium.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
In the minute 62, West Bromwich are pushing forward but Matt Phillips's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
Ilkay Gundogan (Man City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 66, Man City's Phil Foden breaks free at Etihad Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Peter Bankes awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Man City's Kevin De Bruyne is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City are coming forward and Rodri gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 69, Peter Bankes awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Charlie Austin is replacing Karlan Ahearne-Grant for the away team.
Throw-in for Man City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, Man City have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
West Bromwich needs to be cautious. Man City have an attacking throw-in.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Man City in the half of West Bromwich.
Throw-in for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 76, Kyle Walker is on a sub for Benjamin Mendy for Man City.
Pep Guardiola is making the team's second substitution at Etihad Stadium with Sergio Aguero replacing Phil Foden.
Kyle Walker (Man City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 78, Man City have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City push forward at Etihad Stadium and Sergio Aguero gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the West Bromwich defence.
In the minute 79, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Man City.
Filip Krovinovic is replacing Jake Livermore for West Bromwich at Etihad Stadium.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Kevin De Bruyne (Man City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 85, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Man City.
Kevin De Bruyne for Man City drives towards goal at Etihad Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Peter Bankes signals a Man City throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team have replaced Matt Phillips with Lee Peltier. This is the third substitution made today by Slaven Bilic.
Man City's Sergio Aguero breaks free at Etihad Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 88, West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at Etihad Stadium.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Ilkay Gundogan (Man City) strikes at Etihad Stadium but his header is cleared.
Man City to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Man City are coming forward and Ilkay Gundogan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Peter Bankes awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Man City's Raheem Sterling goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Free kick West Bromwich.
Man City have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Romaine Sawyers for West Bromwich has been booked by Peter Bankes and receives a first yellow card.
Nathan Ake is booked for the home team.
